name: Two Forces Apart
description:
Game Introduction: Siren's sound, ravens gather. An empire is torn by darkness. The Governor is dead. Beyond the borders, new factions rise. You gird on your weapons, don your Armour, summon your followers, and ride forth to win glory over the darkness that has spread throughout your father's empire. You wish to establish your right as the next governor, so you set forth to seek control of what should be yours. To create a new world out of the ashes to rid and execute the darkness that haunts the lands.

Objective: You as the player wish to seek the revenge of your father, as well as restore the empire your father led. You wish to explore the lands to seek and execute the darkness that arises in them. However, tables turned when you found out your half brother was being controlled like a puppet after being cursed by a evil sorcerer in order to follow the commands of a evil daemon. You decided you wanted to save your half brother in order to join forces and take back what your father owned.

Movement Controls:
WASD = Movement
WA = Climb The Ladder
Space = Jump

Content: This is currently just one level that I have done for the game. I hope to update this at some-point in the future with more mechanics, bug fixes ect.

Known Issues:

Only one of the checkpoints work

Player does not lose health lives
